name: LEGAL CAPITAL, LLC and Charles I. Artz, Appellants, v. MEDICAL PROFESSIONAL LIABILITY CATASTROPHE LOSS FUND, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Legal Capital, LLC v. Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund
docket_number: Appeal No. 52 Middle District Appeal Docket 1998

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: LEGAL CAPITAL, LLC and Charles I. Artz, Appellants, v. MEDICAL PROFESSIONAL LIABILITY CATASTROPHE LOSS FUND, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of June, 1999, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed on the basis of its opinion. Legal Capital v. Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund, 702 A.2d 869 (Pa.Cmwlth.1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Charles I. Artz, Harrisburg, for Legal Capital, LLC, et al.
Guy A. Donatelli, William H. Lamb, West Chester, Maureen M. McBride, for Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund.
casebody.head_matter:
731 A.2d 132
LEGAL CAPITAL, LLC and Charles I. Artz, Appellants, v. MEDICAL PROFESSIONAL LIABILITY CATASTROPHE LOSS FUND, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 17, 1998.
Decided June 23, 1999.
Charles I. Artz, Harrisburg, for Legal Capital, LLC, et al.
Guy A. Donatelli, William H. Lamb, West Chester, Maureen M. McBride, for Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
